title.rendered: Say Hello to the New Fundbox Mobile Apps

content.rendered:
As the year comes to a close, we couldn’t resist sneaking in one last big update. We’re excited to announce that the new Fundbox mobile apps have launched!

As of this month, you can now access you Fundbox account using either the Android or iOS Fundbox app. If you have previously connected your accounting software, you are invited to use the app.

  • Download the Fundbox Android app from the Google Play store.
  • Download the Fundbox iOS app from the Apple App store.

We first released our iOS app a little while ago, but we heard your feedback that it lacked some important features. That’s why we redesigned it from top to bottom, to give you the best possible experience using Fundbox from your smartphone. We also heard from many of you that an Android app would be helpful, so we created one and released it for the first time this month.

Here are a few features to know about the Fundbox mobile apps:

  • Manage your existing Fundbox line of credit on the go
  • Lightening fast and secure fingerprint login
  • Customize your notifications so you don’t miss a thing

Just like the Fundbox experience you know on your desktop, you can use the app to check your balances, draw funds, view unpaid invoices, and make repayments. Manage your business funds anywhere, anytime.

 

One last important note: If you connected to Fundbox using a business bank account, and not your accounting software, you won’t be able to use the apps yet. We’ll be adding new functionality in the months ahead to better serve all of our customers, so please stay tuned.

  • Download the Fundbox Android app from the Google Play store.
  • Download the Fundbox iOS app from the Apple App store.
